SELECT su.USER_ID AS userId, su.SEX AS sex, su.AVATAR AS avatar, su.FULL_NAME AS fullName, aps.IS_ABSENT AS isAbsent, aps.IS_PASS AS isPass, aps.IS_LATE AS isLate FROM SYS_USER su, APP_RECORD_STUDENT aps WHERE su.USER_ID = aps.USER_ID AND aps.COURSE_RECORD_ID = #{courseRecordId}
AND aps.IS_ABSENT = 1
AND aps.IS_PASS = 1
AND aps.IS_PASS = 0
ORDER BY aps.UPDATE_TIME ASC
